name: Elvis Presley Lyrics Online Trivia | Elvis Lyrics | 20 Questions

questions.text: 'There must be lights burning brighter somewhere.'
'You can shake an apple off an apple tree.'
'I gave a letter to the postman, he put it his sack.'
'You ask how much I need you, must I explain.'
'Decorations of red on a green Christmas tree, won't be the same dear, if you're not here with me.'
'To tell the world I'm yours, by heck, let them see your love for me.'
questions.correct: Wear My Ring Around Your Neck
questions.explanation: Wear My Ring Around Your Neck.

questions.text: 'Today I stumbled from my bed, with thunder crashing in my head.'
'Pardon me, if I'm sentimental when we say goodbye.'
'Can't you see I love you, please don't break my heart in two.'
'You know I can be found, sitting all alone.'
'I don't wanna be a tiger, 'cause tigers play too rough.'
'Everytime I hear a newborn baby cry, or touch a leaf or see the sky.'
'Now Adam told to Eve, 'Listen here to me, don't you let me catch you messin' round that apple tree.''
'You ain't no friend of mine. When they said you was high classed, well, that was just a lie.'
'Well, since my baby left me, I found a new place to dwell.'
'Her hair is soft and her eyes are oh so blue.'
'The way she moves her hips to her fingertips, I feel I'm heaven bound.'
'I feel my temperature rising. Higher, higher, it's burning through to my soul.'
questions.correct: Burning Love & Burnin' Love & Burnin Love
questions.explanation: Burning Love & Burnin' Love & Burnin Love.

questions.text: 'Seven lonely days and a dozen towns ago, I reached out one night and you were gone.'
'Hey mama, don't you treat me wrong, come and love your daddy all night long.'
